credit_line: Gift of Stanley Siegel, from the Stanley Siegel Collection
title: Vase
description: Tall, cylindrical glass vase (a) with slightly flaired mouth; dark green leaf motif at bottom eased over gold favrile glass.  Vase fits into socket of bronze base (b) patinated at top, inverted trumpet-shaped, ruffled, resting on series of horizontal S-curves picked out with gilding.  Three metal 3-pronged holders (c,d,e) to fit into base to hold vase.
name: Vase
